net.floodlightcontroller.core.rest

类 SwitchRepresentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.core.rest.SwitchRepresentation

  • public class SwitchRepresentation
extends java.lang.Object
    REST representation of an OF Switch. Stitches together data from different areas of the platform to provide a complete, centralized representation.
    作者:
    Jason Parraga
